alert.note: Alert for Appling; Bacon; Coffee; Jeff Davis; Wayne (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 3:10PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Coffee, northwestern Bacon, northwestern Wayne, Jeff Davis and Appling Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 309 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong thunderstorms along from near Georgia Southern to 6 miles southeast of Alamo to 6 miles southeast of Rochelle. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts 40 to 50 mph and excessive cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Excessive cloud-to-ground lightning is occurring. Locations impacted include... Douglas, Baxley, Hazlehurst, Alma, Broxton, Ambrose, Graham, Surrency, Plant Hatch and Pridgen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Appling; Bacon; Coffee; Jeff Davis; Wayne
